# GET /roles/{id}

> **Operation ID:** `getRole`
> **Tags:** `Roles`

## Get one role

Returns the details of a specific role.

## Parameters

| Name | Type | In | Required | Description |
|------|------|-------|----------|-------------|
| `id` | integer | path | Yes | The ID of the role |

## Responses

**200** - Get one role

Response type: `application/json`

```

```


## Security

- **api_key**
- **oauth2**: admin
